testcase.name: testResponseCode

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. Expected header "Content-Length" was not "455", was "451". Headers are: Server=openresty Date=Mon, 30 Jul 2018 15:03:41 GMT Content-Type=application/json; charset=utf-8 Content-Length=451 Connection=keep-alive X-Cache-Key=/data/2.5/weather?APPID=d05a336b7efdc14276d2a4cad2ef7538&zip=03820%2cus Access-Control-Allow-Origin=* Access-Control-Allow-Credentials=true Access-Control-Allow-Methods=GET, POST
